snippet: The ruling freed lawyers to learn more to support the claim that the 2010 raid on Level Global Investors had resulted from deliberate misrepresentations.
abstract: United States District Court Judge William H Pauley III in Manhattan rules lawsuit brought by Level Global Investors hedge fund owner David Ganek may proceed; Ganek claims heavy-handed Federal Bureau of Investigation raid in connection with crackdown on insider trading violated his civil rights and forced him to close business.
lead_paragraph: The ruling freed lawyers to learn more to support the claim that the 2010 raid on Level Global Investors had resulted from deliberate misrepresentations.

headline.main: Hedge Fund Owner’s Suit Over F.B.I. Raid May Proceed, Judge Rules
headline.print_headline: Hedge Fund Owner’s Suit Over F.B.I. Raid May Proceed, Judge Rules
